t: NetRush carves out niche helping businesses pitch their goods on Amazon - The Columbian
s: June 5, 2016 - In effect, NetRush is itself an independent retailer within the Amazon labyrinth for the brands it represents. Its work includes writing up product descriptions, posting photos, flagging unauthorized sellers and arranging for product shipments through Amazon’s fulfillment centers.
